import { useFormik } from 'formik'; import React from 'react'; import './Regirster.css'; import * as Yup from 'yup' export default function Regirster() { const validationSchema=Yup.object({ name: Yup.string().min(3,"name is too short "), email: '', password: '', repassword: '', phone: '', }) const regasterForm = useFormik({ initialValues: { name: '', email: '', password: '', repassword: '', phone: '', }, onSubmit: () => console.log('kooo'), }); return ( <>
